name: Dice God
description:
DIRECTIONS

Movement: AWSD

Shooting: Left Mouse Button

STORY

The Dice God went mad. "NO MORE RNG! I'm not your puppet" he yelled.  Hop on your mecha and make the Dice God serve us again!
